name: Flame of Memory
description: Flame of Memory is a strategy/indie game where your task is to survive as long as you can, in a dark forest. At your disposal will get two guerillas, whom you can give commands. How long can you survive?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD FX Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 660 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 250 MB available space
